hero.title: Learn, Add and Share with Wordigo!
hero.description: By clicking on the Wordigo translation button on the screen, you can view the translation of the selected on the screen text in your preferred language and listen to its pronunciation.

about.title: About
about.description: Wordigo allows you to translate and add discovered words while browsing with its browser extension, and share them in your personal dictionary. The Wordigo team collaborates to provide a more effective language learning experience.
